title: Time capsule to be buried at city primary school (Leicester City Council)
text: ( Source : Leicester City Council ) Published on 13 October 2015 PUPILS are marking building work at a city primary school by burying a time capsule. Work is well under way at Kestrels' Field Primary School , in Hamilton , where contractors are
